meanings.sent1: The unfruitful tree stood alone in the field, devoid of any apples or pears.
meanings.sent2: The farmer was disappointed with the unfruitful harvest this year.
meanings.sent3: The unfruitful tree seemed to be on a fruit strike, refusing to bear any apples.
meanings.sent4: Her unfruitful efforts in the garden left her feeling as barren as the soil.
meanings.sent5: The unfruitful land was a stark reminder of nature's unpredictability.

meanings.sent1: The unfruitful meeting did not lead to any new ideas or solutions.
meanings.sent2: His unfruitful attempts at fixing the car only made the problem worse.
meanings.sent3: The unfruitful brainstorming session felt like a waste of time.
meanings.sent4: Her unfruitful job search left her feeling discouraged and frustrated.
meanings.sent5: The unfruitful project was a setback for the entire team.
